summary: I HAVE 1997 DODGE INTREPID (3.5 L ENGINE).  PASSENGER SIDE FUEL RAIL HAS DEVELOPED LEAK.  PROBLEM IS NOT O-RING, BUT APPEARS TO BE CRACK.  DEALER AND DODGE CUSTOMER SERVICE SAY THIS IS NO PROBLEM, IS SIMPLE WEAR AND TEAR ITEM.  I BELIEVE THIS IS A DEFECT ISSUE WITH THE FUEL RAIL AND A SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE AND SHOULD BE A RECALL ITEM.  EST COST OF REPAIR (INCLUDING DIAGNOSIS , MULTIPLE ACCESSES TO RAIL) $600.00 (ONE SIDE ONLY).   *NLM
